theme.spacegray.tabs.height.markdownDescription: Controls size of file tabs. Valid values are `"normal"`, `"large"`, `"xlarge"` and `"small"`.

theme.spacegray.tabs.auto_width.markdownDescription: Controls whether minimum file tab width.

theme.spacegray.sidebar.row_height.markdownDescription: Controls size of file tabs. Valid values are `"normal"`, `"large"`, `"xlarge"` and `"small"`.

theme.spacegray.sidebar.show_icons.markdownDescription: Controls whether to show folder and file icons in sidebar.

theme.spacegray.sidebar.vcs_color_labels.markdownDescription: Controls whether to show vcs status of tracked files and folders by color of their labels in sidebar.

theme.spacegray.sidebar.vcs_color_expand.markdownDescription: Controls whether to show vcs status of expanded folders by color of their labels in sidebar.
